what: Axe, IBM, WAVE, and 11 custom tests

acts.what: used for tests on which chromium fails on some URLs
conduct and report an Axe test

must pass any of.description: Element does not have inner text that is visible to screen readers
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

items.description: Ensures every form element has a label

must pass any of.description: Form element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label>
Form element does not have an explicit <label>
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"
Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty

must pass all of.description: Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text

acts.what: report the count of visible elements
tabulate and list active elements contained by links or buttons
tabulate and list focusable elements with and without focus outlines

miracari10_main; Recruit Voice Recruit Voice ミラキャリ通信 Vol10. 「転職」を考えている人は「副業」への関心も強い 副業が「転職」「キャリア」にもたらす効果 ‘2021.08.31
‘21.09.21 TUE 飲食 コロナ禍で「なじみの外食店」が減った人37.6% 「外出・外食控え」が最大要因 新たにできた「なじみの外食店」の立地は「自宅や最寄り駅周辺」が圧倒的多数 コロナ禍前後
‘21.09.16 THU 学習 『スタディサプリ ENGLISH』全コースに初学者向け基礎リスニング講座を追加
‘21.09.16 THU 雇用 コロナ禍2年目 東京在住者 地方・郊外移住、46.6%が興味あり 障壁は『仕事面の不安』が最多 テレワークの継続実施に関心
‘21.09.15 WED 業務・経営支援 リクルートグループ、デジタル口座管理・決済ができるサービス 『エアウォレット』を2021年度冬に提供開始
‘21.09.15 WED 業務・経営支援 カード・電子マネー・QR・ポイントも使えるお店の決済サービス『Airペイ』 2021年度冬より「COIN＋」取り扱い開始
‘19.03.04 MON 当社グループを名乗る架空請求メールにご注意ください
‘13.11.11 MON リクルートを連想させる迷惑メールに関するご注意

items.message: The value "menu-state" of the 'for' attribute is not the 'id' of a valid <input> element
Form control element <input> has no associated label
Form control element <button> has no associated label
Hyperlink has no link text, label or image with a text alternative
The <label> element does not have descriptive text that identifies the expected input
Text contrast of 1.05 with its background is less than the WCAG AA minimum requirements for text of size undefinedpx and weight of 400
The <figure> element does not have an associated label
The <figure> element does not have an associated label
